game.name: Nightmare On Maple Road
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: NIGHTMARE ON MAPLE ROAD is a survival horror game about juggling two characters at once, where failure for one means death for both. Solve puzzles, explore an abandoned house, and endure quick-time events while keeping them both alive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: NIGHTMARE ON MAPLE ROAD is a survival horror game about juggling two characters at once, where failure for one means death for both. Solve puzzles, explore an abandoned house, and endure quick-time events while keeping them both alive.
